results.title: Targeting ageing and preventing organ degeneration with metformin.
results.text_hl: Targeting ageing and preventing @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ degeneration@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Reduced Mortality Associated With the Use of Metformin Among Patients With Autoimmune Diseases
results.text_hl: In this study, we aimed to examine the long-term impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on mortality and @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune diseases@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@).

citations.NLM: Lin CY, Wu CH, Hsu CY, Chen TH, Lin MS, Lin YS, Su YJ. Reduced Mortality Associated With the Use of Metformin Among Patients With Autoimmune Diseases Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2021;12():641635. PMID: 33967957

results.title: Impact of Socio-Demographics and Knowledge, Attitudes, and Practices (KAP) on Misconceptions of Metformin Use in Diabetes: A Potential Myth and Disbelief in South Asia.
results.text_hl: Among all participants (N=400), the most common misconception was that long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ caused @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ (@DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney@@@ 72.5%, liver 64.3%, and heart 34.8%), while 44% believed higher doses (two tablets or more for a day) caused @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Chanika Rangani LA, Mendis BILM, Rajapakse H, Dissanayake A. Impact of Socio-Demographics and Knowledge, Attitudes, and Practices (KAP) on Misconceptions of Metformin Use in Diabetes: A Potential Myth and Disbelief in South Asia. Cureus. 2024 Aug;16(8):e67509. PMID: 39310418
citations.BibTeX: @article{39310418, title={Impact of Socio-Demographics and Knowledge, Attitudes, and Practices (KAP) on Misconceptions of Metformin Use in Diabetes: A Potential Myth and Disbelief in South Asia.}, author={Chanika Rangani LA and Mendis BILM and Rajapakse H and Dissanayake A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={e67509}}

results.title: Synergistic Effects of Combined Anthocyanin and Metformin Treatment for Hyperglycemia In Vitro and In Vivo.
results.text_hl: In the @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model, combined treatment (50 and 100 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Anthocyanins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000872 @@@anthocyanin@@@ groups) demonstrated synergistic restorative effects on the blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ level, @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@ in the liver, pancreas, and ileum.

citations.NLM: Tian JL, Si X, Shu C, Wang YH, Tan H, Zang ZH, Zhang WJ, Xie X, Chen Y, Li B. Synergistic Effects of Combined Anthocyanin and Metformin Treatment for Hyperglycemia In Vitro and In Vivo. J Agric Food Chem. 2022 Feb 2;70(4):1182-1195. PMID: 35044756
citations.BibTeX: @article{35044756, title={Synergistic Effects of Combined Anthocyanin and Metformin Treatment for Hyperglycemia In Vitro and In Vivo.}, author={Tian JL and Si X and Shu C and Wang YH and Tan H and Zang ZH and Zhang WJ and Xie X and Chen Y and Li B}, journal={J Agric Food Chem}, volume={70}, number={4}, pages={1182-1195}}

results.title: Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: When there is an immediate need to encounter the fast-rampant @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@infection of COVID-19@@@ and control the @DISEASE_Virus_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014777 @@@viral-infection@@@ associated morbid @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokine storm causing severe @<m>DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@organ damage@@@, SPM and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should be seriously considered as a potential adjunctive treatment.

citations.NLM: Zahoor I, Li Y, Rattan R, Giri S. Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2021;1352():211-222. PMID: 35132603
citations.BibTeX: @article{35132603, title={Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis.}, author={Zahoor I and Li Y and Rattan R and Giri S}, journal={Adv Exp Med Biol}, volume={1352}, pages={211-222}}
